author: Bellular News
description:
EA is going private. Few trust their new owners.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 "No Immediate Changes" (press f to doubt)
01:12 Private Acquisition
03:58 Who Are The Buyers?
07:39 What This Means
11:26 How They're Buying EA
15:36 Prestige Protection
